movies.title: Avatar
movies.overview: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

movies.title: Osiris
movies.overview: Special Forces commandos on a mission are abducted mid-operation by a mysterious spacecraft. Upon waking aboard, they find themselves prey to a relentless alien race in a fight for survival.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.overview: As U.S. troops storm the beaches of Normandy, three brothers lie dead on the battlefield, with a fourth trapped behind enemy lines. Ranger captain John Miller and seven men are tasked with penetrating German-held territory and bringing the boy home.

movies.title: Klaus
movies.overview: A selfish postman and a reclusive toymaker form an unlikely friendship, delivering joy to a cold, dark town that desperately needs it.

movies.title: Just Friends
movies.overview: Joris is trying to come to terms with his broken family relationships on the 10th anniversary of his father’s death when he meets the free-spirited, Yad.

movies.title: Green Book
movies.overview: Tony Lip, a bouncer in 1962, is hired to drive pianist Don Shirley on a tour through the Deep South in the days when African Americans relied on a guide called The Negro Motorist Green Book.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
movies.overview: Ethan Hunt and team continue their search for the terrifying AI known as the Entity.

movies.title: F1
movies.overview: Racing legend Sonny Hayes is coaxed out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team.

movies.title: Wolf Children
movies.overview: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies, a woman must find a way to raise their son and daughter.

movies.title: The Stepmother's Bond
movies.overview: Paula faces the everyday challenge of proving that she deserves the title of mother.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.overview: World War II soldier-turned-U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a patient.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: After the death of Emperor Marcus Aurelius, Maximus is forced to become a gladiator.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.overview: Hiccup stands apart when he befriends a feared Night Fury dragon.

movies.title: Weapons
movies.overview: A community is left questioning who or what is behind the disappearance of children.

movies.title: Maa
movies.overview: A mother and daughter encounter a demon in a village where girls have been disappearing.

movies.title: The Pickup
movies.overview: A routine cash pickup takes a wild turn when mismatched armored truck drivers are ambushed.

movies.title: The Naked Gun
movies.overview: Only one man has the particular set of skills to lead Police Squad and save the world.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Imprisoned for a double murder, Andy Dufresne begins a new life at Shawshank prison.

movies.title: Star Wars
movies.overview: Princess Leia is captured and held hostage by the evil Imperial forces.

tv_shows.title: Grey's Anatomy
tv_shows.overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of a group of doctors at Seattle’s Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital.

tv_shows.title: Beauty in Black
tv_shows.overview: A stripper's fate takes a turn when she crosses paths with a wealthy, dysfunctional family behind a cosmetics dynasty.

tv_shows.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
tv_shows.overview: Beginning in a time of relative peace, we follow an ensemble cast of characters as they confront the re-emergence of evil.

tv_shows.title: Billionaires' Bunker
tv_shows.overview: When a group of billionaires takes shelter in a luxury bunker, an old feud between two families resurfaces.

tv_shows.title: Batman: The Animated Series
tv_shows.overview: Vowing to avenge the murder of his parents, Bruce Wayne devotes his life to wiping out crime in Gotham City.

tv_shows.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
tv_shows.overview: Accompanied by his elegant and trustworthy sidekicks, the intelligent Belgian detective Hercule Poirot investigates deceptions.

tv_shows.title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
tv_shows.overview: Every summer is the same ... until Belly turns sixteen and relationships will be tested.

tv_shows.title: The Ba***ds of Bollywood
tv_shows.overview: An ambitious outsider navigates the chaotic world of Bollywood.

tv_shows.title: Snowfall
tv_shows.overview: Set against the infancy of the crack cocaine epidemic, the story follows characters on a violent collision course.

tv_shows.title: Doctor Who
tv_shows.overview: The Doctor is a Time Lord saving planets for a living.

tv_shows.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
tv_shows.overview: Miyuki Shirogane and Kaguya Shinomiya are regarded as the perfect couple despite not being in a romantic relationship.

tv_shows.title: Secrets of the Silent Witch
tv_shows.overview: Monica Everett, the Silent Witch, goes undercover at a prestigious school for nobles.

tv_shows.title: The Sopranos
tv_shows.overview: The story of mobster Tony Soprano and his struggles balancing home life and the criminal organization he heads.

tv_shows.title: Gen V
tv_shows.overview: At America's only college for superheroes, students compete for the university's top ranking.

tv_shows.title: Wednesday
tv_shows.overview: Wednesday Addams investigates twisted mysteries while making friends and foes at Nevermore Academy.

tv_shows.title: Modern Family
tv_shows.overview: A hilariously honest look at the warm and twisted embrace of the modern family.

tv_shows.title: SAKAMOTO DAYS
tv_shows.overview: Taro Sakamoto, a retired hitman, must fight to protect his beloved family.

tv_shows.title: Lost
tv_shows.overview: Stripped of everything, the survivors of a plane crash must work together to survive.

tv_shows.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
tv_shows.overview: Devastated, mankind's last remnants moved underground to wait for their fate against the Angels.

tv_shows.title: Time Raiders
tv_shows.overview: Antique dealer Wu Xie stumbles upon a cryptic silk text leading to hidden treasures.
